title: What was Elon Musk’s strategy for Twitter?
description: A year after Elon Musk acquired Twitter, a game plan published by a fired Trump White House staffer provides a clue about his strategy for the social media platform.

title: A nationwide emergency alert will be sent to all U.S. cellphones Wednesday
description: A nationwide test of the emergency and wireless alert systems will be conducted Wednesday, when a message will be sent to all cellphones, TVs and radios.

title: Elon Musk sued for libel by man falsely identified in neo-Nazi brawl
description: Elon Musk has been sued for libel by a man who says the billionaire amplified posts that falsely identified him as having been involved in a fight between extremist groups in Oregon.

title: Yelp and Texas AG are suing each other over description of crisis pregnancy centers
description: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton and Yelp are suing each other over language included on the pages of crisis pregnancy centers — which aim to dissuade people from having abortions — that accurately noted they may not have licensed medical professionals on staff. The subject of Paxton’s suit is a notice Yelp included on the reviews of some crisis pregnancy centers for six months, from August 2022 — February 2023, which noted that such places “typically provide limited medical services

title: 9-year-old girl suspected of being abducted in New York 'disappeared into thin air,' her aunt says
description: The aunt of a 9-year-old girl from upstate New York who is believed to have been abducted Saturday said her niece "disappeared into thin air” in a matter of minutes.

title: Rep. Matt Gaetz concedes Kevin McCarthy 'probably' can survive a first vote to oust him
description: Rep. Matt Gaetz conceded that Speaker Kevin McCarthy “probably” can survive a conservative effort to oust him from power, but said he may force several votes.

title: Philadelphia journalist fatally shot in his home
description: A Philadelphia journalist and community advocate was fatally shot inside his home overnight, according to police.

title: E.U. makes historic show of support for Ukraine after U.S. budget deal snub
description: All 27 European Union foreign ministers descended on Kyiv on Monday in a historic show of support following the passage of the U.S. funding bill.

title: Record-breaking, summer-like temperatures expected across Midwest and Northeast
description: Portions of the Upper Midwest saw record-shattering, summer-like warmth Sunday when temperatures soared above 90 degrees in some areas.

title: Clarence Thomas recuses himself as Supreme Court rejects ex-Trump lawyer John Eastman's appeal
description: Clarence Thomas recused himself from a case involving the Jan. 6 attack on the Capitol as the Supreme Court rejected former Trump adviser John Eastman's appeal.

title: Apple says it will fix software problems blamed for making iPhone 15 models too hot to handle
description: Apple is blaming a software bug and other issues tied to popular apps such as Instagram and Uber for causing its recently released iPhone 15 models to heat up and spark complaints about becoming too hot to handle.

title: Tom Hanks warns fans about 'AI version of me' promoting dental plan
description: Tom Hanks warns fans about ‘AI version of me’ promoting dental plan. "I have nothing to do with it,” Hanks wrote over the photo of his AI counterpart.

title: Biden delivers remarks on the Americans with Disabilities Act
description: Watch live coverage as President Biden delivers remarks at the White House to celebrate the Americans with Disabilities Act.

title: Shop these big deals on items for Target Circle Week
description: Target Circle Week is back with more deals for shoppers! Shop All Day contributor Chassie Post stops by Studio 1A with the different products on sale, including holiday products, wireless earbuds, countertop appliances, totes, boots and more!

title: Amazon customers report false email confirmations for gift cards they didn't buy
description: Amazon customer service representatives this weekend have been handling a wave of inquiries from customers who received suspicious and confusing email confirmations about gift card purchases they had not made.

title: Martina Navratilova talks cancer journey, importance of screenings
description: Tennis legend Martina Navratilova stops by TODAY and opens up about her multiple cancer diagnoses and talks about the importance of getting screened. Hologic CEO Stephen MacMillan joins the conversation and shares some of the pioneering 3D technology being used to help detect diseases.

title: Trump's defense delivers opening arguments in New York fraud trial
description: Live updates: Trump's New York fraud trial begins

title: Trump civil fraud trial gets underway in New York
description: The no-jury trial in Manhattan is expected to last three months. Former President Donald Trump and several of his children are listed as potential witnesses.

title: Simone Biles lands historic vault as she leaps back onto the world stage
description: Simone Biles became the first woman to land a complicated vault internationally at the 2023 World Artistic Gymnastic Championships in Antwerp, Belgium.

title: Gov. Gavin Newsom chooses Laphonza Butler to fill Dianne Feinstein's Senate seat
description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom has chosen Laphonza Butler, the president of EMILY's List, to fill the seat of the late Democratic Sen.
